translations: n．仲裁员：在争议双方之间进行仲裁以解决纠纷的中立人。

sentences.sentence: Arbitrators must fulfil one of the following conditions.
sentences.translation: 仲裁员应当符合下列条件之一。

sentences.sentence: Today that a panel of arbitrators has decided in favor of our company.
sentences.translation: 今天仲裁团做出了有利于我们公司的裁决。

sentences.sentence: Article 30 An arbitration tribunal may comprise three arbitrators or one arbitrator.
sentences.translation: 第三十条仲裁庭可以由三名仲裁员或者一名仲裁员组成。
